statements: UPDATE identity_management SET user_role='Admin', is_verified=TRUE WHERE user_id=123;
UPDATE identity_management SET user_email='newemail@example.com', user_name='New Name' WHERE user_id=456;
UPDATE identity_management SET user_name='John Doe', user_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE identity_management SET user_role='Admin', is_verified=TRUE WHERE user_name='Alice Smith';
UPDATE IdentityVerification SET verification_status = TRUE WHERE user_id = 1001;
UPDATE AccessControls SET access_level = 2, access_time = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 1002;
UPDATE IdentityVerification SET full_name='John Smith', id_number='1234567890' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE AccessControls SET access_level=2, access_time='2022-03-15 10:00:00' WHERE access_id=5;
UPDATE IdentityVerification SET verification_status = TRUE WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SmartContracts SET contract_address = '0xAbCDeF0123456789' WHERE contract_id = '456e7890-f12a-34b5-c678-901d23450100';
UPDATE IdentityVerification SET verification_status = FALSE, phone_number = '+123456789' WHERE user_id = '062e9a45-8039-4d3d-9067-e33e0b9b9cc8';
UPDATE AccessControls SET last_login = '2023-01-05 12:30:00', access_level = access_level + 1 WHERE user_id = 'd5790ff7-38e2-4fd1-8395-3c67b663f49e';
UPDATE User SET username='john_doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE Role SET description='Admin role for managing users' WHERE role_id=2;
UPDATE User SET email='example@example.com', username='new_username' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE AccessControl SET permission='read,write' WHERE user_id=2 AND role_id=1;
UPDATE user_identities SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE access_controls SET access_level='WRITE' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE user_identities SET email = 'newemail@example.com', created_at = NOW() WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_roles SET description = 'Updated role description' WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
